com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.reflection

Class NMSClassTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.reflection.ClassTemplate<java.lang.Object>
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.reflection.NMSClassTemplate

  • public class NMSClassTemplate
extends ClassTemplate<java.lang.Object>
    A Class Template meant for pointing to a Class in the net.minecraft.server Package
    Automatically deals with package versioning
    The empty constructor can be used to initialize this Class using the current Class name

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected NMSClassTemplate()
      Initializes this NMS Class Template using the NMS Class name the same as this Class
      If this Class is called 'Packet', it will point to Class 'net.minecraft.server.
        NMSClassTemplate(java.lang.String className)
      Initializes this NMS Class Template pointing to the class name specified

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static NMSClassTemplate create(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a new NMS Class Template for the net.minecraft.server Class name specified
      protected void setNMSClass(java.lang.String className)
      Initializes this net.minecraft.server Class Template to represent the NMS Class name specified

      • Methods inherited from class com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.reflection.ClassTemplate

        getConstructor, getField, getFieldAt, getFields, getMethod, getStaticFieldValue, getStaticFieldValue, getType, isAssignableFrom, isInstance, isType, isType, isValid, newInstance, newInstanceNull, setClass, setStaticFieldValue, toString, transfer

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • NMSClassTemplate

        protected NMSClassTemplate()
        Initializes this NMS Class Template using the NMS Class name the same as this Class
        If this Class is called 'Packet', it will point to Class 'net.minecraft.server.[version].Packet'
        A leading 'NMS' or trailing 'Ref' is omitted from the Class name, avoiding the Class showing up in the imports

        This constructor should and can only be called by an extension of this Class

      • NMSClassTemplate

        public NMSClassTemplate(java.lang.String className)
        Initializes this NMS Class Template pointing to the class name specified
        Parameters:
        className - in the NMS package

    • Method Detail

      • setNMSClass

        protected void setNMSClass(java.lang.String className)
        Initializes this net.minecraft.server Class Template to represent the NMS Class name specified
        Parameters:
        className - to represent

      • create

        public static NMSClassTemplate create(java.lang.String name)
        Creates a new NMS Class Template for the net.minecraft.server Class name specified
        Parameters:
        name - of the class in the NMS package
        Returns:
        new Class Template
